---
title: "AI Synthesis"
editor: visual
---

Our initial (AI - ChatGPT) analysis of survey responses suggest the following burning issues for the science of fires and watersheds:

1\) Understanding Fire Impacts on Biogeochemical Cycling

2\) Modeling and Predicting Fire Impacts

3\) Fire Effects on Microbial Communities

4\) Fire Impacts on Watershed Dynamics

5\) Fire Effects on Water Quality and Drinking Water

6\) Socio-Ecological Perspectives on Fire Management

7\) Connectivity and Controls in Fire-Impacted Watersheds
